titleStmt.title: Tvvo letters from the presbytery of Carrick-Fergus, to the Lord Ards, and his ansvver to the first of them
titleStmt.author: Mount-Alexander, Hugh Montgomery, Earl of, 1624 or 5-1663.
Church of Ireland. Diocese of Down, Connor, and Dromore.

notesStmt.note: Letters dated, respectively: At Carrickfergus June 29. 1649; Belfast, June 30: 1649; At Carrickfergus the 20 of July, 1649.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
